page.title: 02LIFESTYLES VILLAGE MORELEIGH
page.content: Moreleigh is a small village situated on the B3207 1km E of the A381 between Totnes and Kingsbridge. It is partly within Halwell and Moreleigh parishes. The population is 100. It is a working largely agricultural village, businesses consisting mainly of self-employed farmers and agricultural contractors/engineers. There is also a haulage contractor and a builder who runs an undertaking business and has a chapel of rest on the premises. Moreleigh has escaped much of the second home and retirement development experienced by many other villages - it has few community facilities, with potential for more. A village hall is in prospect and there is a social committee which organises several successful events each year.
